"記憶に残された橙色の花":
"Dear <%me>,
Are you familiar with the fauna of
Naberius? The Nab Rappies seem to be
attracted to orange flowers native to
the planet.

Could you Porfavor bring some back for
Matoi? I have a feeling they'll help restore
her memory. Besides, I'd love to see them!
※Cae de Nab Rappies."
